concept.title: MMC Controller
concept.shortdesc: The MMC Controller provides kernel extensions that manages access to the MultiMediaCard hardware on behalf of media drivers or any other device driver.

conbody.p: This section describes how to create a port of it for your phone hardware. Symbian platform provides a generic Platform-Independent part of the Controller. You must provide a Platform-Specific part to implement the interface to the MMC hardware on your phone.
